keys: Conflictos de Sociedad. Plan de lección
resource_data:

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4255</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Role Play on the Plantation of Ulster</string>
            <string language="es">Juego de papeles jugados en la colonización de Ulster</string>
            <string language="ga">Rólghlacadh maidir le Plandáil Ulaidh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rolle Spiel auf der Plantage von Ulster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu de rôle sur la plantation d'Ulster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo do papel na plantação de Ulster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioco di ruolo sulla piantagione di Ulster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδι ρόλου στη φυτεία της Ulster</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The Plantation of Ulster is the base on which this role play device can be used for developing the skills of the young historian.</string>
            <string language="es">La colonización de Ulster es la base de este juego de papeles que se utiliza para desarrollar las habilidades del joven historiador.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tá Plandáil Ulaidh mar bhunús do rólghlacadh ar féidir aúsáid chun scileanna an staraí óg a fhorbairt.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE History</string>
            <string language="es">Historia SESE. Política</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Stair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Politics</string>
            <string language="es">Conflictos de Sociedad. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Polaitíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ConflictSociety</string>
            <string language="ga">Sochaí i gCoimhlint</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Plantage von Ulster ist die Unterseite, auf 
der diese Rolle Spieleinheit für das Entwickeln der Fähigkeiten des 
jungen Historikers benutzt werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La plantation d'Ulster est la base sur laquelle ce
dispositif de jeu de rôle peut être utilisé pour développer les 
qualifications du jeune historien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A plantação de Ulster é a base em que este 
dispositivo do jogo do papel pode ser usado desenvolvendo as 
habilidades do historian novo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La piantagione di Ulster è la base su cui questo 
dispositivo del gioco di ruolo può essere utilizzato per sviluppare 
le abilità dello storico giovane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η φυτεία της Ulster είναι η βάση στην οποία αυτή η
συσκευή παιχνιδιού ρόλου μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για την 
ανάπτυξη των δεξιοτήτων του νέου ιστορικού.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Politik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ConflictSociety</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
